title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it fails to take focus. Currently, the only way to make the Combo take focus is by dropping down the combo list.
OB: The Combo does not take focus when clicked.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Click on the first Combo labeled 'Host:' and observe that it does not take focus.
